alert.note: Alert for Eastern King William; Eastern King and Queen; Gloucester; Lancaster; Mathews; Middlesex; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Gloucester, Middlesex, southeastern King and Queen, northeastern New Kent, northwestern Mathews, southeastern King William and central Lancaster Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms over Church View, or near Urbanna, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Glenns around 135 PM EDT. Saluda around 140 PM EDT. Urbanna around 145 PM EDT. Kilmarnock and White Stone around 230 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Eltham, Mollusk, Senora, Harmony Village, Bertrand, Grafton, Harcum, Cash, Dragonville and Millenbeck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern King William; Eastern King and Queen; Gloucester; Lancaster; Mathews; Middlesex; New Kent
